title: Wagamama - Tivoli
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International franchise chain inspired by Japanese food. Food cooked in an open kitchen. Vegetarian items are marked with a V. Vegan items are offered but are not marked; ask staff for help. Two types of noodles are without egg. Other vegetarian dishes can be made vegan. English menus available. Open to Tivoli Gardens visitors from within the park and others from the main road. No entrance to Tivoli Gardens through the restaurant for non-ticket holders.
